title: Recall Notification Report
summary: WASHINGTON, Aug. 30, 2012 - Klement Sausage Company Inc., a Milwaukee, Wis. establishment, is recalling approximately 2,920 pounds of frozen bratwurst patties because they may contain foreign materials—pieces of a plastic pen, the U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today...
impacted_products: 10-lb. cases containing 4-ounce patties of KLEMENT SAUSAGE CO. BRATWURST PATTY.
